ygData.subject: re: Fear/Chain, is not cheesy
ygData.msgSnippet: speaking of fear/chain, i was running to rathe mountains and on my way from freeport saw a ranger getting wooped by Dorn... well well well payback time. I
ygData.messageBody:
speaking of fear/chain, i was running to rathe mountains and on my way from
freeport saw a ranger getting wooped by Dorn... well well well payback time.
I start pounding away at him with my normal buff songs and he's doing about
the same damage as i am than he is to me, well to hell with this, i chain
him down and fear him, so i took off about half his health using fear, this
tactic is great against cyclops when ya get a druid to snare it, then fear
it and just pound away. Its sad when a level 14 npc is pounding the hell out
of a 31th level pc. I just decided to not take any chances with him. And
upon zoning into Sro afterwards, i saw terrorantula, but was alone and not
taking any chances against it, since i would have needed to charm a giant
against it so it was too dangerous for me and my untrusty ISP.

Nothing kills me more then my connectivity.

Minkin
Sol ro
Bard of the 31st level

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: September 12, 1999 11:53 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Fear/Chain, is, not, cheesy, and, is
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> what a joke. have you EVER heard from anyone that they think it is cheesy
> and don't like you and won't group with you for doing chain/fear? the
> only
> thing i have ever heard is respect for being able to do this, especially
> from people who watch or group members. what i have heard is people
> thinking druids are cheesy for kiting or wizards bastards for
> kill-stealing.
> all druids or wizards? of course not. but that i have heard from the
> masses, not one thing about chain/fear.
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria, Level 16 High Elf Wizard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
